statements: UPDATE customer_feedback SET rating=4, review='Great service' WHERE customer_name='Alice';
UPDATE customer_feedback SET review='Bad experience', rating=2 WHERE customer_name='Bob';
UPDATE customer_feedback SET rating = 5, review = 'Excellent service provided' WHERE feedback_id = 1
UPDATE customer_feedback SET service_type = 'Support', timestamp = '2022-01-10 14:30:00' WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe'
UPDATE customer_feedback SET rating = 4.5, feedback_text = 'Great service!' WHERE feedback_id = 1;
UPDATE service_provider SET location = 'New York', rating = 4.8 WHERE provider_id = 2;
UPDATE customer_feedback SET rating = 4.5, feedback_text = 'Great service!' WHERE feedback_id = 123 AND customer_id = 456;
UPDATE service_provider SET location = 'New York', provider_name = 'ABC Company' WHERE provider_id = 789;
UPDATE customer_feedback SET service_rating = 5 WHERE customer_id = 123;
UPDATE customer_satisfaction SET overall_satisfaction = 9, loyalty_score = 8 WHERE customer_id = 456;
UPDATE customer_feedback SET service_rating = 5, feedback_text = 'Excellent service provided', feedback_date = '2022-06-15' WHERE feedback_id = 101 AND customer_id = 201;
UPDATE customer_satisfaction SET overall_satisfaction = 9, loyalty_score = 8, survey_date = '2022-05-20' WHERE satisfaction_id = 301 AND customer_id = 201;
UPDATE customers SET phone_number = '+1-123-456-7890' WHERE customer_id = '8c92c786-301b-48f7-94f1-041b1aafe893';
UPDATE services SET price = 49.99, duration = 60 WHERE service_id = '5d8b62b9-46b0-42f6-af25-0b25da5f0e3b';
UPDATE customers SET address = '123 Main Street, New York' WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE services SET price = 100.50, description = 'Premium Service' WHERE service_id = '456e7890-e12b-34c5-d678-901223567890';
UPDATE Customers SET customer_name='John Doe', customer_email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE Services SET service_price=75.50, service_description='Highly recommended service' WHERE service_id=3;
UPDATE Customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe', customer_email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE Reviews SET review_rating = 4, review_comment = 'Great service!' WHERE customer_id = 2 AND service_id = 1;
